attributes.long-description:
Compatible with the PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) and PlayStation®Vita systems only.

Overview
The boys are back in town – but something strange is going on in Phineas and Ferb’s home city of Danville.

Inspired by the Disney Channel movie and PlayStation®3 game, Phineas and Ferb: Across the Second Dimension sees the dynamic duo travel through space and time to battle against Dr Doofenshmirtz and his evil robot army and save Danville from his dastardly plans.

Armed with power-packed gadgets and accompanied by a cast of eight playable characters, it’s time to team up with Phineas and Ferb and friends to help save the Tri-State area!

Features
• Travel through different dimensions and explore 24 levels of action-packed platform adventure.
• Take control of eight playable characters and tackle epic boss battles with six upgradable gadgets.
• Soar through the skies and take out Dr Doofenshmirtz’s robot army using an amazing jetpack.

Important Notices
• Visit us.playstation.com to find out more about Phineas and Ferb Across the Second Dimension and the exciting world of PlayStation®Network.

This item is being licensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item.

This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation® devices associated with this Sony Entertainment Network Account. Please see software description for device compatibility.

Phineas and Ferb Across the Second Dimension ©2012 Disney. Developed by Virtual Toys and High Impact Games.
attributes.name: Phineas and Ferb Across the Second Dimension PSP®
